summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2112, for the improvement of North 82nd Street and North 84th Street, each from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue; and Fremont Avenue and Dayton Avenue, each from East 81st Street to North 85th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21206 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
